00295     class Iterator
00296     {
00297     public:
00298       Iterator(Node** data, unsigned position, unsigned arraySize)
00299       {
00300         myArraySize = arraySize;
00301         myContainerData = data;
00302         myNode = data[0];
00303         myCurrentCell = position;
00304         while((!myNode) && (myCurrentCell < myArraySize))
00305           {
00306             myNode = myContainerData[++myCurrentCell];
00307           }
00308         //std::cerr << "iterator::position :" << bits::bitString(myCurrentCell, 12)<<std::endl; 
00309       }
00310       bool isAtEnd()const{return myCurrentCell >= myArraySize;}
00311       ValueType& operator*(){return myNode->getObject();}
00312       bool operator ++ () {return next();}
00313       bool operator == (const Iterator& it)
00314       {
00315         if(isAtEnd() && it.isAtEnd()) return true;
00316         else return (myNode == it.myNode);
00317       }
00318       bool operator != (const Iterator& it)
00319       {
00320         if(isAtEnd() && it.isAtEnd()) return false;
00321         else return (myNode != it.myNode);
00322       }
00323       inline HashKey getKey() const {return myNode->getKey();}
00324       bool next();
00325     protected:
00326       Node* myNode;
00327       unsigned int myCurrentCell;
00328       unsigned int myArraySize;
00329       Node** myContainerData;
00330     };

00377     template <int X, unsigned exponent> struct POW
00378     {
00379       enum{ VALUE = X* POW<X, exponent-1>::VALUE};

00390     inline HashKey getIntermediateKey(HashKey key) const;
00391    
00392 
00397     Node* addNode(ValueType object, HashKey key)
00398     {
00399       Node* n = getNode(key);
00400       if(n)
00401         {
00402           n->getObject() = object;
00403           //n->setObject(object);
00404           return n;
00405         }
00406       n = new Node(object, key);
00407       HashKey key2 = getIntermediateKey(key);
00408       n->setNext(myData[key2]);
00409       myData[key2] = n;
00410       return n;
00411     }
00412 
00417     inline Node* getNode(HashKey key)   const   // very used !!
00418     {
00419       Node* iter = myData[getIntermediateKey(key)];
00420       while(iter != 0)
00421         {
00422           if(iter->getKey() == key) return iter;
00423           iter = iter->getNext();
00424         }
00425       return 0;
00426     }
